entries: While inside the swarm's space, any creature that tries to {@action cast a spell} must avoid the wrath of the fanatics. The creature can choose another action, but if it tries to cast the spell, it must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, it takes {@damage 1d6} fire damage per level of the spell, and the spell has no effect and is wasted.

items.name: Purified by Fire
entries: When the swarm hits with any weapon, if the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

items.name: Reactive
entries: The swarm can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

items.name: Unruly
entries: If the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer at the start of its turn, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 5 or 6, the swarm uses up all its movement to move in a random direction. To determine the direction, roll a {@dice d8} and assign a direction to each die face. The swarm doesn't take an action this turn.

items.name: Countercharge
entries: En respuesta a una criatura que entre en su alcance, el enjambre puede realizar un ataque con arma cuerpo a cuerpo con ventaja contra la criatura.

items.name: Impetuous
entries: If the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer at the start of its turn, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 5 or 6, the swarm uses up all its movement to move toward the nearest and most obvious seat of power. The swarm moves toward the seat of power by the most direct route.

items.name: Sworn Enemy
entries: The swarm has a sworn enemy, which include every identified member of an organization or government. When the swarm makes a melee or ranged attack roll against its sworn enemy, it has advantage on the roll. In addition, its target gains no benefit from cover, other than total cover. If the attack hits, the sworn enemy takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage.

items.name: Destructive
entries: The swarm deals double damage to objects and structures.

items.name: Inspirational Ideals {@recharge 4}
entries: Up to three allies within 120 feet of the swarm that can hear it can use their reactions to be freed from any {@condition charmed|PHB|charm} and {@condition frightened|PHB|fright} effect.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: Como acción de bonificación, el heredero puede moverse hasta su velocidad hacia una criatura hostil que pueda ver.

trait.name: Ancestor's Protection
entries: El heredero tiene ventaja en las tiradas de salvación contra cualquier hechizo que tenga como objetivo sólo al heredero. Si la tirada de salvación del heredero tiene éxito y el hechizo es de 7º nivel o inferior, el heredero no se ve afectado, y el efecto se refleja en el lanzador como si se originara en el heredero, convirtiendo al lanzador en el objetivo.

trait.name: Brute
entries: Un arma cuerpo a cuerpo inflige un dado extra de su daño cuando el heredero impacta con ella (incluido en el ataque).

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Los ataques con armas del heredero son mágicos.

trait.name: Mariner
entries: The heir can hold its breath underwater for twice as long and has proficiency with {@item navigator's tools|PHB}. The heir is also naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: Mientras el heredero no lleve armadura, su CA incluye su modificador de Constitución.

trait.name: Unbridled Rage
entries: Como acción adicional, el heredero puede entrar en cólera al comienzo de su turno. La furia dura hasta que el heredero tenga {@condition incapacitated} o decida terminarla. Mientras está enfadado, el heredero obtiene los siguientes beneficios:

items: El heredero tiene ventaja en los chequeos de Fuerza y en las tiradas de salvación de Fuerza.
Cuando realiza un ataque con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo, el heredero obtiene un bono de +4 a la tirada de daño.
El heredero tiene resistencia al daño contundente, perforante y cortante.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El heredero realiza dos ataques cuerpo a cuerpo o cuatro ataques cuerpo a cuerpo si le queda menos de la mitad de sus puntos de vida. Al impactar, el heredero puede causar un efecto adicional, eligiendo entre las opciones siguientes (cada efecto sólo puede usarse una vez por turno):

items: El ataque inflige un 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de daño cortante adicional.
The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the northlander's next turn.
El ataque evita las resistencias al daño del objetivo.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d12 + 7}) de daño cortante.

monster.name: Vargheist
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: El vampiro tiene ventaja en las tiradas de ataque cuerpo a cuerpo contra cualquier criatura que no tenga todos sus puntos de golpe.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the vampire is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, that target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. If the target is {@condition prone} and {@condition stunned}, the vampire can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: El vampiro no provoca ataques de oportunidad cuando vuela fuera del alcance de un enemigo.

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: El vampiro recibe 20 de daño radiante cuando comienza su turno a la luz del sol. Mientras esté a la luz del sol, tiene desventaja en las tiradas de ataque y los chequeos de habilidad.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El vampiro realiza tres ataques cuerpo a cuerpo, de los cuales sólo uno puede ser un ataque de mordisco.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape {@dc 16}).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, una criatura que esté {@condition grappled} por el vampiro, {@condition incapacitated} o {@condition restrained}. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de daño perforante más 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de daño necrótico. El máximo de puntos de golpe del objetivo se reduce en una cantidad igual al daño necrótico recibido, y el vampiro recupera puntos de golpe iguales a esa cantidad. La reducción dura hasta que el objetivo termina un descanso largo. El objetivo muere si este efecto reduce su punto de vida máximo a 0.

variant.name: Ancient Vargheist
entries: Over the centuries particularly old vargheist regain a measure of their abilities. These creatures often become pack leaders or instead turn into lonely hunter, their greed and thurst for blood driving them away from the pack. An ancient vargheist has a challenge rating of 10 (5,900 XP) and the following additional traits:

entries.name: Regeneration
entries: El vampiro recupera 20 puntos de vida al comienzo de su turno si tiene al menos 1 punto de vida. Si el vampiro recibe daño radiante, este rasgo no funciona al inicio del siguiente turno del vampiro .

entries.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the vampire's choice that is within 120 feet of the vampire and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the ancient vargheist's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

items.name: Regeneration
entries: The vampire regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If the vampire takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn .

items.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the vampire's choice that is within 120 feet of the vampire and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the ancient vargheist's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: El varghulf no puede usar su vista ciega mientras {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Monstrous Leap
entries: El salto de longitud del varghulf es de hasta 40 pies y su salto de altura es de hasta 25 pies, con o sin salida en carrera.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: El varghulf recupera 20 puntos de vida al comienzo de su turno si tiene al menos 1 punto de vida. Si el varghulf recibe daño radiante, este rasgo no funciona al inicio del siguiente turno del vampiro.

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: El varghulf recibe 20 de daño radiante cuando comienza su turno a la luz del sol. Mientras esté a la luz del sol, tiene desventaja en las tiradas de ataque y en los chequeos de habilidad.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El varghulf realiza tres ataques cuerpo a cuerpo, de los cuales sólo uno puede ser un ataque de mordisco.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} para golpear, alcance de 10 pies, un objetivo. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d10 + 9}) de daño cortante.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} + {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}35 ({@damage 4d12 + 9}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the varghulf can't bite another target.

legendary.name: Hunger's Call
entries: el varghulf se mueve hasta la mitad de su velocidad hacia un enemigo que pueda ver, sin provocar ataques de oportunidad.

legendary.name: Red Thirst
entries: Una criatura a la que el varghulf esté agarrando con su mordisco recibe 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de daño necrótico. El máximo de puntos de golpe del objetivo se reduce en una cantidad igual al daño necrótico recibido, y el varghulf recupera puntos de golpe iguales a esa cantidad. La reducción dura hasta que el objetivo termina un descanso largo. El objetivo muere si este efecto reduce su punto de vida máximo a 0. Si el varghulf mata a una criatura con su Sed Roja, gana una acción adicional en su siguiente turno.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: El varghulf hace un ataque de mordida.

monster.name: Vargr

ac.condition: in dire wolf or hybrid form

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

languages: Common (can't speak in dire wolf form)

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: As a bonus action, the vargr can polymorph into a Large wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a dire wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, size and speed, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The vargr has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vargr regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If the vargr takes damage from a silvered weapon, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vargr's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack (Hybrid Form Only)
entries: The vargr makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite (Dire Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

action.name: Claws (Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Harrier (Dire Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: In response to a visible enemy moving out of its reach, the vargr can make one melee weapon attack with advantage against the moving creature. If the attack hits, the target's speed becomes 0 until the end of its turn.

variant.name: Heart of the Pack
entries: A {@creature vargr alpha|BoBH} is a natural pack leader. Its presence galvanizes and coordinates a werewolf pack far beyond what any regular pack alpha would. Under the alpha's command, a werewolf pack is a formidable adversary, fighting and hunting as one:

entries.name: Shared Legendary Actions
entries: Werewolves that are within 120 feet of a {@creature vargr alpha|BoBH} can collectively take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. The werewolves regain spent legendary actions at the start of the {@creature vargr alpha|BoBH|vargr alpha's} turn.

items.name: Fast Change
entries: A werewolf of the pack polymorphs into its hybrid or wolf form.

items.name: Rush Attack
entries: A werewolf of the pack moves up to its speed, then makes a bite attack.

items.name: Pack Unity (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each werewolf within 120 feet of the {@creature vargr alpha|BoBH} can't be charmed or frightened until the end of the {@creature vargr alpha|BoBH|vargr alpha's} next turn.

items.name: Call the Pack (Cost 3 Actions)
entries: The werewolves howl in unison to call {@dice 1d6} {@creature wolf|MM|wolves} or 1 {@creature dire wolf}. The called creatures arrive in {@dice 1d4} rounds, acting as allies of the pack. The beasts remain for 1 hour, or until a werewolf of the pack dismisses them as a bonus action.

Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. The werewolves regain spent legendary actions at the start of the {@creature vargr alpha|BoBH|vargr alpha's} turn.

entries: The vargr's allies have advantage on melee attack rolls against any hostile creature within 5 feet of the vargr.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell

action.name: Claws (Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de daño cortante.

legendaryHeader: Werewolves that are within 120 feet of a {@creature vargr alpha|BoBH} can collectively take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. The werewolves regain spent legendary actions at the start of the {@creature vargr alpha|BoBH|vargr alpha's} turn.

legendary.name: Fast Change
entries: A werewolf of the pack polymorphs into its hybrid or wolf form.

legendary.name: Rush Attack
entries: A werewolf of the pack moves up to its speed, then makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Pack Unity (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each werewolf within 120 feet of the {@creature vargr alpha|BoBH} can't be charmed or frightened until the end of the {@creature vargr alpha|BoBH|vargr alpha's} next turn.

legendary.name: Call the Pack (Cost 3 Actions)
entries: The werewolves howl in unison to call {@dice 1d6} {@creature wolf|MM|wolves} or 1 {@creature dire wolf}. The called creatures arrive in {@dice 1d4} rounds, acting as allies of the pack. The beasts remain for 1 hour, or until a werewolf of the pack dismisses them as a bonus action.

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: El hombre lobo puede utilizar su acción para polimorfarse en un híbrido lobo-humanoide o en un lobo, o volver a su verdadera forma, que es humanoide. Sus estadísticas, aparte de su CA, son las mismas en cada forma. Cualquier equipo que lleve puesto o que porte no se transforma. Vuelve a su verdadera forma si muere.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: El voref recupera 20 puntos de vida al inicio de su turno si tiene al menos 1 punto de vida. Si el hombre lobo recibe daño de un arma plateada, este rasgo no funciona al inicio del siguiente turno del hombre lobo.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: Si el hombre lobo es asesinado, recupera todos sus puntos de golpe en 24 horas, a menos que se coloque acónito en su cuerpo, en cuyo caso tardará {@dice 1d10} días en rejuvenecer. Si la plata atraviesa el corazón del hombre lobo durante el
luna, el hombre lobo está realmente muerto.

trait.name: Voref Weaknesses
entries: El voref tiene los siguientes defectos:

items.name: Call of the Moon:
entries: During the night of the full moon, the true nature of the voref is revealed. The creature automatically polymorphs into its hybrid form and acts according to its alignment. The werewolf is also free to ignore its master's order during these nights.

items.name: Voice of the Master:
entries: The voref is completely under the thrall of the person that cursed it. It is considered under the permanent effects of the dominate monster spell from its master.

items.name: Wolfsbane Allergy:
entries: If the werewolf comes within 20 feet of aconitum flowers, it is {@condition poisoned} until it leaves the area. Weapons coated with aconitum oil ignore the damage invulnerabilities of the werewolf.

action.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: El voref puede utilizar su Aullido a la Luna. A continuación, realiza tres ataques cuerpo a cuerpo: uno con su mordisco maldito y dos con sus garras.

action.name: Claws (Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} para golpear, alcance de 1,5 m, un objetivo. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de daño cortante, más 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de daño cortante si al hombre lobo le queda más de la mitad de sus puntos de vida totales.

action.name: Cursed Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5ft.,one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d8 + 3}) piercing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage if the werewolf has more than half of its total hit points remaining. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be magically cursed. Until the curse ends, the target can't regain hit points and has vulnerability to all damage. Greater restoration, remove curse, or similar magic ends the curse on the target.

action.name: Howl at the Moon (Hybrid Form Only) {@recharge 5}
entries: The werewolf howls with an insane look in its eyes. All creatures within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be under the effects of a confusion spell for one minute. At the end of each of its turn a creature can reattempt the saving throw, ending the effect on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The vozhark's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 22}, {@hit 14} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
will: {@spell eldritch blast} (4 beams, +7 bonus to each damage roll)

trait.name: Flaying Pseudopod
entries: El vozhark realiza un ataque pseudopoderoso (no requiere acción) contra cualquier criatura que comience su turno a menos de 3 metros del vozhark si éste no está {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Si el vozhark falla una tirada de salvación, puede elegir tener éxito en su lugar.

trait.name: Psionic Shroud
entries: El vozhark es inmune a cualquier efecto que pueda sentir sus emociones o leer sus pensamientos, así como a todos los hechizos de adivinación.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El vozhark realiza tres ataques: uno con sus garras y dos con sus pseudópodos y, si puede, utiliza su Revelación Cósmica. Puede utilizar Tentáculo de Agarre en lugar de cualquier ataque con los pseudópodos.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) de daño cortante.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 22}). The vozhark has ten pseudopods, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Grasping Tentacle
entries: The vozhark extends one tentacle to lash out at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and is pulled up to 60 feet toward the vozhark. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn' t pulled.

action.name: Cosmic Revelation {@recharge 5}
entries: The vozhark projects visions of cosmic horror into the minds of creatures of its choice within 120 feet of it. A creature must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of the vozhark's next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature is under the effects of the confusion spell.

reaction.name: Hostile Telepathic Transfer
entries: Cuando el vozhark recibe daño, una criatura a elección del vozhark en un radio de 2 millas recibe un daño psíquico igual a esa cantidad; el vozhark no recibe ningún daño.

legendary.name: Psychic Shock
entries: Cada criatura {@condition grappled} junto al vozhark recibe 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de daño psíquico.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: El vozhark lanza un hechizo de su rasgo Hechicería Innata.

legendary.name: Eldritch Star (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The vozhark flies up to half its flying speed and then sheds green bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet until the start of its next turn. When the light appears, each creature in it must make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Any creature that ends its turn within the bright light must also make this saving throw and is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Necromancer's Moon
entries: When the vozhark uses Eldritch Star, the damage is necrotic instead of radiant. A creature dies if reduced to 0 hit points by this damage. A humanoid killed in this way rises at the start of the vozhark's next turn as an undead. If the humanoid had 2 or fewer Hit Dice, it becomes a {@creature zombie}. If it had 3 to 5 Hit Dice, it becomes a {@creature ghoul}. If it had 6 or more Hit Dice, it becomes a {@creature wight}.

entries.name: Extinguish Life {@recharge 5}
entries: The vozhark targets one creature that it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw against this magic or drop to 0 hit points. On a successful save, the target is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Harbinger of Death (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: El vozhark usa Extinguir Vida, si puede.

entries.name: Out-of-Phase Movement
entries: The vozhark can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. Each creature it moves through takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage; no creature can take this damage more than once per turn. The vozhark takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

entries.name: Lurker at the Threshold {@recharge 5}
entries: The vozhark moves itself and up to seven other creatures it can see through the flow of time, moving {@dice 1d10 x 100} years forward or backward (vozhark's choice). Only the vozhark is immediately aware of the time change. A {@spell wish} spell can return the caster and up to seven other creatures designated by the caster to their normal time. Alternatively, the vozhark shifts itself and up to seven other creatures it can see to another plane of existence.

entries.name: Change Gravity (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The vozhark casts the {@spell reverse gravity} spell. The spell has the normal effect, except that the vozhark can orient the area in any direction and creatures and objects fall toward the end of the area.

entries.name: Psionic Might
entries: The vozhark can maintain {@status concentration} on two different enchantment or illusion spells at the same time. In addition, it has advantage on saving throws to maintain {@status concentration} on spells.

entries.name: Rending the Veil {@recharge 4}
entries: The vozhark targets a creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 22} Intelligence saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target instead takes 100 psychic damage and is {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Call of Cthulhu (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The vozhark targets a creature that it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be {@condition charmed} by the vozhark until a {@spell remove curse} spell is cast on it. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the vozhark's verbal or telepathic commands.

entries.name: Foul Regeneration
entries: The vozhark regains 30 hit points at the start of its turn. If the vozhark is targeted by {@spell dispel magic} or is in the area of an {@spell antimagic field}, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vozhark's next turn. The vozhark dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Birth of a Thousand Young (3/Day)
entries: In response to taking piercing or slashing damage, the vozhark gives birth through the wound to {@filter an aberration of challenge rating 10 or lower|bestiary|source=|Challenge Rating=[&0;&10]|type=aberration|miscellaneous=}, or {@dice 1d4 + 1} {@filter aberrations of challenge rating 5 or lower|bestiary|source=|Challenge Rating=[&0;&5]|type=aberration|miscellaneous=}. An aberration appears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the vozhark and acts on its own initiative count.

items.name: Necromancer's Moon
entries: When the vozhark uses Eldritch Star, the damage is necrotic instead of radiant. A creature dies if reduced to 0 hit points by this damage. A humanoid killed in this way rises at the start of the vozhark's next turn as an undead. If the humanoid had 2 or fewer Hit Dice, it becomes a {@creature zombie}. If it had 3 to 5 Hit Dice, it becomes a {@creature ghoul}. If it had 6 or more Hit Dice, it becomes a {@creature wight}.

items.name: Extinguish Life {@recharge 5}
entries: The vozhark targets one creature that it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw against this magic or drop to 0 hit points. On a successful save, the target is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

items.name: Harbinger of Death (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The vozhark uses Extinguish Life, if it can.

items.name: Out-of-Phase Movement
entries: The vozhark can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. Each creature it moves through takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage; no creature can take this damage more than once per turn. The vozhark takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

items.name: Lurker at the Threshold {@recharge 5}
entries: The vozhark moves itself and up to seven other creatures it can see through the flow of time, moving {@dice 1d10 x 100} years forward or backward (vozhark's choice). Only the vozhark is immediately aware of the time change. A {@spell wish} spell can return the caster and up to seven other creatures designated by the caster to their normal time. Alternatively, the vozhark shifts itself and up to seven other creatures it can see to another plane of existence.

items.name: Change Gravity (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The vozhark casts the {@spell reverse gravity} spell. The spell has the normal effect, except that the vozhark can orient the area in any direction and creatures and objects fall toward the end of the area.

items.name: Psionic Might
entries: The vozhark can maintain {@status concentration} on two different enchantment or illusion spells at the same time. In addition, it has advantage on saving throws to maintain {@status concentration} on spells.

items.name: Rending the Veil {@recharge 4}
entries: The vozhark targets a creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 22} Intelligence saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target instead takes 100 psychic damage and is {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: Call of Cthulhu (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The vozhark targets a creature that it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be {@condition charmed} by the vozhark until a {@spell remove curse} spell is cast on it. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the vozhark's verbal or telepathic commands.

items.name: Foul Regeneration
entries: The vozhark regains 30 hit points at the start of its turn. If the vozhark is targeted by {@spell dispel magic} or is in the area of an {@spell antimagic field}, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vozhark's next turn. The vozhark dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

items.name: Birth of a Thousand Young (3/Day)
entries: In response to taking piercing or slashing damage, the vozhark gives birth through the wound to {@filter an aberration of challenge rating 10 or lower|bestiary|source=|Challenge Rating=[&0;&10]|type=aberration|miscellaneous=}, or {@dice 1d4 + 1} {@filter aberrations of challenge rating 5 or lower|bestiary|source=|Challenge Rating=[&0;&5]|type=aberration|miscellaneous=}. An aberration appears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the vozhark and acts on its own initiative count.

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.name: Feral Rage {@recharge}
entries: As a bonus action, the vukodlak can extend bones from its body and enter a rage. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the vukodlak is {@condition incapacitated}. While raging, the vukodlak gains the following benefits:

items: The vukodlak has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Any critical hit against the vukodlak becomes a normal hit.

A creature that grapples the vukodlak or is {@condition grappled} by it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage. A creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage if it starts its turn grappling or being {@condition grappled} by the vukodlak.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The vukodlak has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Smell Fear
entries: The vukodlak can smell the presence of {@condition frightened} creatures within 2 miles of it. It knows the distance and direction to each creature. In addition, the vukodlak has advantage on melee attack rolls against a {@condition frightened} creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vukodlak can use its Feral Howl. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It can use Hail of Spikes in place of any claw attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the vukodlak can't bite another target. A creature takes 21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage if it escapes from the grapple or if it tries and fails. Additionally if the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hail of Spikes
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Feral Howl
entries: The vukodlak howls fiercely. Every enemy within 300 feet of the vukodlak that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} target that starts its turn within 30 feet of the vukodlak must use all its movement on that turn to get as far from the vukodlak as possible, must take the most direct route, even if hazards lie that way, and must finish the move before taking an action. A creature that ends its turn in a location where it doesn't have line of sight with the vukodlak can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the vukodlak's Feral Howl for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Lore Keeper
entries: El völva tiene ventaja en los chequeos de habilidad de Inteligencia y Sabiduría.

trait.name: Mariner
entries: The völva can hold her breath underwater for twice as long and has proficiency with {@item navigator's tools|PHB}. The völva is also naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

trait.name: Seeress
entries: La völva no puede ser sorprendida y las tiradas de ataque contra ella tienen desventaja a menos que la völva sea {@condition incapacitated} o {@condition restrained}. Mientras la völva no lleve armadura, su CA incluye su modificador de Sabiduría.

trait.name: Wand-Wed
entries: The völva carries a staff carved out of the wood of a mystical white tree, that is a focus for her inner power. She can use the staff as if it were a {@item staff of healing} (Wisdom spellcasting ability). If the staff is lost or destroyed, the völva must craft another, which takes a year and a day. Only a völva can use the staff.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Tormenting Vision
entries: The völva targets one creature she can see within 60 feet of her. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is under one of the following effects, chosen by the völva:

items: El objetivo recibe 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de daño psíquico y queda {@condition frightened} hasta el final del siguiente turno de la völva.

En su turno, el objetivo no puede moverse, y utiliza su acción para realizar un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo o a distancia contra una criatura determinada al azar que esté dentro de su alcance. Si el objetivo no puede atacar, no hace nada en su turno.
El objetivo está {@condition stunned} durante 1 minuto. El objetivo puede repetir la tirada de salvación al final de cada uno de sus turnos, terminando el efecto con un éxito.

monster.name: Warp Spawn
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Otherworldly Presence
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the spawn and can see it, the spawn can force the creature to make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw if the spawn isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature acquires a short-term madness randomly determined which lasts for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the madness on a success. A creature which already has a short-term madness, is immune to psychic damage, or which has succeeded on a saving throw to this spawn's Otherworldly Presence in the last 24 hours is immune.

trait.name: Warp Form
entries: El engendro de la urdimbre es inmune a cualquier hechizo o efecto que pueda alterar su forma. Siempre que el engendro comience su turno con 50 puntos de vida o menos, tira un {@dice d6}. Con una tirada de 5 o 6, el engendro queda {@condition incapacitated} durante un asalto mientras se debate entre formas de pesadilla.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: El engendro de la urdimbre tiene ventaja en las tiradas de salvación contra hechizos y otros efectos mágicos.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El engendro de la urdimbre utiliza su Mutated Beyond Reason y realiza tres ataques cuerpo a cuerpo; uno con su mordisco, otro con sus garras y otro con sus tentáculos.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) de daño perforante.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de daño cortante.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) de daño por apaleamiento más 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de daño psíquico. Si el objetivo es mediano o
smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Mutated Beyond Reason
entries: El spawn de la urdimbre muta y selecciona una de las opciones siguientes.
1. Mutación mortal. El engendro se desplaza de su velocidad y realiza un ataque de tentáculos.

2. Eldritch Burst. Great bolts of eldritch energy are arcing out of the warp spawn. A line 60 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from it in a direction it chooses. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
3. Regeneración. El engendro de la urdimbre recupera 10 puntos de vida.

reaction.name: Mask of Insanity
entries: When a creature the spawn can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the aberration, the spawn can wrap its mind in psychic terror. If the creature can see the spawn, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its turn.

variant.name: Warp Spawn (Sickening Glow)
entries: Some aberrations radiate of the sickening glow of the warpstone. Thankfully these creature are pretty easy to identify, manifesting the same light-absorbing quality as the warpstone itself. A creature with that option has the additional trait:

entries.name: Sickening Glow
entries: Any creature other than an aberration, a construct or an undead that starts its turn within 20 feet of the aberration or enters the affected area for the first time on a turn must succeed a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw Constitution saving throw or contract the {@disease Warp Touch|BoBH} disease. If a creature's saving throw is successful, it is immune to the aberration's Sickening Glow for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Detect Heat
entries: El elemental puede percibir mágicamente la presencia de fuentes de calor, incluidas las criaturas de sangre caliente, hasta 5 millas de distancia. Conoce la dirección general en la que se encuentran, pero no su ubicación exacta.

trait.name: Drain Warmth
entries: When a creature of the elemental's choice starts its turn within 60 feet of the elemental, the elemental can force the creature to make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw if the elemental isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature has vulnerability to cold damage for 1 minute, until it has immunity to cold damage. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the elemental's Drain Warmth for the next 24 hours. A lesser restoration spell ends this effect.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: El elemental puede moverse por superficies heladas y escalarlas sin necesidad de realizar un chequeo de habilidad. Además, los terrenos difíciles compuestos por hielo o nieve no le cuestan movimiento extra.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El elemental hace dos ataques de golpe.

action.name: Hurl Ice
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} para golpear, alcance 60/240 pies, un objetivo. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de daño por apaleamiento más 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de daño por frío.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de daño por apaleamiento más 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de daño por frío.

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The general's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}). The general can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Frost Weapons
entries: Los ataques con armas del general son mágicos. Cuando el general golpea con cualquier arma, el arma inflige un {@dice 4d8} de daño por frío adicional (incluido en el ataque).

trait.name: Juggernaut
entries: Un arma inflige dos dados extra de su daño cuando el general impacta con ella (incluidos en el ataque). El general inflige el doble de daño a los objetos y estructuras.

trait.name: Pain Indifference
entries: La CA del general incluye su modificador de Constitución.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El general puede utilizar su Teletransporte de Auge o Inspirar Pavor. A continuación, realiza dos ataques de maul.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the start of the general's next turn.

action.name: Booming Teleport
entries: The general, along with any objects it is wearing or carrying, teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Each creature within 5 feet of the general before it teleports must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage and be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. If the saving throw is successful, the creature takes half the force damage and isn't flung away or knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Inspire Dread {@recharge 5}
entries: The general exudes magical terror. Any creature hostile to the general within 30 feet of the general must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for l minute. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature has disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma saving throws. If a {@condition frightened} target ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the general, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

resist.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The warrior's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). The rider can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Frost Weapons
entries: Los ataques con armas del guerrero son mágicos. Cuando el guerrero golpea con cualquier arma, el arma inflige un {@dice 1d8} de daño de frío adicional (incluido en el ataque).

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}10 ({@dice 2d6 + 3}) más 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de daño por frío.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} para golpear, alcance de 10 pies, un objetivo. {@h}8 ({@dice 1d10 + 3}) más 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de daño por frío.

reaction.name: Arcane Rush
entries: Después de un teletransporte mágico, el guerrero puede realizar un ataque de arma cuerpo a cuerpo con ventaja.

variant.name: Corsair
entries: Corsairs spend most of their time on naglfar ships, sailing the Astral Sea and honing their skills in skirmishes against {@creature githyanki warrior|MM|githyanki warriors}, {@creature githzekai monk|MM|githzekai monks} and other creatures of this dangerous plane. A corsair has a challenge rating of 5 (1,800 XP) and the following additional traits:

items.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: En su turno, el corsario puede realizar una acción adicional y una posible acción extra.

items.name: Endless Hunt (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Cuando el corsario recibe un daño que lo reduce a 0 puntos de vida, recupera inmediatamente 20 puntos de vida.

entries.name: Honor Guard
entries: A corsair that is part of the honor guard (see the "Honor Guard" sidebar, in the Navigator section) has a challenge rating of 7 (2,900 XP).

variant.name: Honor Guard
entries: A Wild Hunt warrior that is part of the honor guard has a challenge rating of 5 (1,800 XP).

Algunos elegidos entre los Dearg Ruadhri tienen el inmenso honor de defender a los navegantes. Estos guardias personales pueden obtener el poder del propio navegante. Un miembro de la guardia de honor tiene los siguientes rasgos:

entries.name: Shared Spellcasting
headerEntries: Mientras los miembros de la guardia de honor estén a menos de 60 pies de un navegante, cada uno puede lanzar los siguientes hechizos, pero deben compartir los usos diarios entre ellos:
footerEntries: For casting these spells, each member of the honor guard is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Charisma as its spellcasting ability. The spell save DC is 12 + the member's Charisma modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4 + the member's Charisma modifier.

entries.name: War Magic
entries: Cuando un miembro de la guardia de honor utiliza su acción para lanzar un cantrip, también puede realizar una acción adicional para realizar un ataque con arma.

items.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: On its turn, the corsair can take one additional action and a possible bonus action.

items.name: Endless Hunt (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the corsair takes damage that reduces it to 0 hit points, it immediately regains 20 hit points.

items.name: Shared Spellcasting
headerEntries: Mientras los miembros de la guardia de honor estén a menos de 60 pies de un navegante, cada uno puede lanzar los siguientes hechizos, pero deben compartir los usos diarios entre ellos:
footerEntries: For casting these spells, each member of the honor guard is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Charisma as its spellcasting ability. The spell save DC is 12 + the member's Charisma modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4 + the member's Charisma modifier. {@note {@dc 14}, {@h} {@hit 6} for a Corsair.}

items.name: War Magic
entries: When a member of the honor guard uses its action to cast a cantrip, it can also take a bonus action to make one weapon attack.

items.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: On its turn, the corsair can take one additional action and a possible bonus action.

items.name: Endless Hunt (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the corsair takes damage that reduces it to 0 hit points, it immediately regains 20 hit points.

items.name: Shared Spellcasting
headerEntries: Mientras los miembros de la guardia de honor estén a menos de 60 pies de un navegante, cada uno puede lanzar los siguientes hechizos, pero deben compartir los usos diarios entre ellos:
footerEntries: For casting these spells, each member of the honor guard is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Charisma as its spellcasting ability. The spell save DC is 12 + the member's Charisma modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4 + the member's Charisma modifier. {@note {@dc 14}, {@h} {@hit 6} for a Red Rider.}

items.name: War Magic
entries: Cuando un miembro de la guardia de honor utiliza su acción para lanzar un cantrip, también puede realizar una acción adicional para realizar un ataque con arma.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: In addition to its weapons, a hunter carries two {@item deep lead bomb|BoBH}, a set of {@item deep lead shackles|BoBH}, and a {@item witch-catcher|BoBH}.

trait.name: Protection of Hatred
entries: El cazador tiene ventaja en las tiradas de salvación contra los hechizos lanzados por criaturas a menos de 1,5 metros de él.

trait.name: Witch-Slayer
entries: Cuando el cazador golpea a un hechicero con un ataque de arma, la criatura recibe un 7 ({@dice 2d6}) de daño adicional del tipo de arma.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El cazador realiza tres ataques con armas cuerpo a cuerpo.

action.name: Deep Lead Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} para golpear, alcance de 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de daño cortante, u 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de daño cortante si se usa a dos manos.

action.name: Silvered Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de daño perforante.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} para golpear, alcance 100/400 pies, un objetivo. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de daño penetrante.

reaction.name: Witch-Counter
entries: En respuesta a una criatura en un radio de 1,5 metros del cazador que lance un hechizo, éste puede realizar un ataque con arma cuerpo a cuerpo con ventaja contra esa criatura. Si el ataque impacta, la criatura debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Constitución con una DC igual al daño recibido, o su hechizo falla y se desperdicia. Una criatura que falle la tirada de salvación por 5 o más queda {@condition stunned} hasta el final del siguiente turno del cazador.

trait.name: Interrogator
entries: El cazador de brujas sabe cuando oye a una criatura decir una mentira en un idioma que conoce.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El cazador de brujas realiza tres ataques: dos con su mangual de marca y uno con su bastón de pinza.

action.name: Branding Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de daño por apaleamiento más 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de daño por fuego.

action.name: Pincer Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the witchfinder can't use its pincer staff on another target. A creature takes 15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) slashing damage if it escapes from the grapple or if it tries and fails.

action.name: Suppress Magic {@recharge 5}
entries: El cazador de brujas tiene como objetivo un objeto mágico que pueda ver en un radio de 120 pies. Si el objeto mágico no es un artefacto, sus propiedades mágicas se suprimen durante 10 minutos, o hasta que el cazador de brujas sea {@condition incapacitated} o muera.

legendary.name: Accuse
entries: The witchfinder targets one creature it can see 60 feet of it. If the target can hear the witchfinder, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the witchfinder until the end of the target's next turn.

legendary.name: Pincer
entries: Una criatura a la que el brujo esté agarrando con su bastón de pinza recibe 15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de daño perforante.

legendary.name: Brand the Heretic (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The witchfinder makes a branding flail attack against a creature. If the attack hits, the target is branded as a heretic. When the branded target tries to cast a spell, it must first succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, or the casting fails and the spell is wasted. The brand remains until removed by the lesser restoration spell or other magic

legendary.name: Reveal Witchcraft (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The witchfinder brandishes its religious symbol and reveals all illusions and shapechangers within 30 feet of itself. An illusion spell instantly ends, while a permanent illusion appears translucent. A shapechanger or a transformed creature must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. If it fails, it reverts to its original form and can't assume a different form until the end of its next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The druid is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric and druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Fey-Touched
entries: The druid can tell if an object or a creature it touches is magical, and if that magic originated from a fey creature. The druid also has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Animal Handling}) checks.

trait.name: Litany of War
entries: Cuando el druida utiliza su acción para lanzar un hechizo o realizar la acción de Ataque, genera 1 acción legendaria compartida para el Jardín de Badb (véase la barra lateral del Jardín de Badb).

trait.name: War Magic
entries: Cuando el druida utiliza su acción para lanzar un hechizo, puede realizar un ataque con arma como acción adicional.

trait.name: Woad War Paint
entries: Cuando el druida queda reducido a 0 puntos de golpe, reduce a una criatura hostil a 0 puntos de golpe o consigue un golpe crítico, genera 1 acción legendaria compartida para el Jardín de Badb (véase la barra lateral del Jardín de Badb).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El druida hace dos ataques de greataxe.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) de daño cortante.

variant.name: Garden of Badb
entries: Badb es la guerra y la guerra es Badb. Cuando la sangre del enemigo fluye en su nombre, la diosa toma nota y recompensa a sus guerreros con poderes exaltados, convirtiéndolos en su instrumento de destrucción. Las criaturas que tienen el {@b Woad War Paint trait} (referido como pintado para esta barra lateral) pueden realizar las siguientes acciones legendarias:

entries.name: Shared Legendary Actions
entries: Los pintados pueden realizar acciones legendarias, eligiendo entre las opciones siguientes, pero deben compartir las acciones entre ellos. Sólo se puede utilizar una opción de acción legendaria a la vez y sólo al final del turno de otra criatura. Las acciones legendarias sólo están disponibles si una criatura genera una con un poder y se pierden todas al final del encuentro de combate.

entries.name: Goddess' Guidance
entries: El pintado realiza un ataque con arma cuerpo a cuerpo con ventaja. Si impacta, el pintado gana puntos de golpe temporales iguales al daño infligido.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: El pintado puede acabar mágicamente con las condiciones {@condition charmed} y {@condition frightened} de sí mismo y de cada criatura de su elección que pueda ver en un radio de 30 pies.

entries.name: Flock of Doom (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The painted summons one {@creature primal murder of crows|BoBH}, which appears within 30 feet of it in an unoccupied space it can see. The swarm obeys its summoner's commands and can't be controlled by any other creature. The swarm vanishes when it drops to 0 hit points.

entries.name: Mist of the Isles (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: El pintado y cada una de las criaturas de su elección que pueda ver en un radio de 30 pies gira mágicamente {@condition invisible} hasta el final del siguiente turno del pintado.

entries.name: Shroud of Badb (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: El pintado es inmune a todos los daños y condiciones hasta el final de su siguiente turno.

entries.name: War is Eternal (Cost 3 Actions)
entries: El pintado tiene como objetivo un humanoide muerto en el último asalto que pueda ver en un radio de 30 pies. El objetivo revive con todos sus puntos de golpe.

trait.name: Fey-Touched
entries: The reaver can tell if an object or a creature it touches is magical, and if that magic originated from a fey creature. The reaver also has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Animal Handling}) checks.

trait.name: Reckless Charge
entries: Si el segador se mueve al menos 6 metros en línea recta hacia un objetivo, tiene ventaja en su próxima tirada de ataque con arma cuerpo a cuerpo contra ese objetivo.

trait.name: Woad War Paint
entries: Cuando el segador queda reducido a 0 puntos de vida, reduce a una criatura hostil a 0 puntos de vida o consigue un golpe crítico, genera 1 acción legendaria compartida para el Jardín de Badb (véase la barra lateral del Jardín de Badb).

action.name: Battleaxe or Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} para golpear, alcance de 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de daño cortante, u 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de daño cortante si se blande con las dos manos.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} para golpear, alcance 5 pies o rango 20/60 pies, un objetivo. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de daño cortante.

variant.name: Garden of Badb
entries: Badb es la guerra y la guerra es Badb. Cuando la sangre del enemigo fluye en su nombre, la diosa toma nota y recompensa a sus guerreros con poderes exaltados, convirtiéndolos en su instrumento de destrucción. entries.name: Exalted

entries.name: Flock of Doom (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The painted summons one {@creature primal murder of crows|BoBH}, which appears within 30 feet of it in an unoccupied space it can see. The swarm obeys its summoner's commands and can't be controlled by any other creature. The swarm vanishes when it drops to 0 hit points.

entries.name: Mist of the Isles (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: El pintado y cada una de las criaturas de su elección que pueda ver en un radio de 30 pies gira mágicamente {@condition invisible} hasta el final del siguiente turno del pintado.

entries.name: Shroud of Badb (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: El pintado es inmune a todos los daños y condiciones hasta el final de su siguiente turno.

entries.name: War is Eternal (Cost 3 Actions)
entries: El pintado tiene como objetivo un humanoide muerto en el último asalto que pueda ver en un radio de 30 pies. El objetivo revive con todos sus puntos de golpe.

trait.name: Brute
entries: Un arma cuerpo a cuerpo inflige un dado extra de su daño cuando el ballenero impacta con ella (incluido en el ataque).

trait.name: Fey-Touched
entries: The whaler can tell if an object or a creature it touches is magical, and if that magic originated from a fey creature. The whaler also has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Animal Handling}) checks.

trait.name: Woad War Paint
entries: Cuando el ballenero se reduce a 0 puntos de vida, reduce a una criatura hostil a 0 puntos de vida o consigue un golpe crítico, genera 1 acción legendaria compartida para el Jardín de Badb (véase la barra lateral del Jardín de Badb).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: El ballenero realiza dos ataques cuerpo a cuerpo o dos ataques a distancia.

action.name: Barbed Harpoon
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/100 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, a creature's speed isn't reduced, but it can move only in directions that bring it closer to the whaler. A creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) slashing damage if it escapes from the grapple or if it tries and fails. As a bonus action, the whaler can pull a creature {@condition grappled} by it 20 feet closer. The whaler can grapple only one creature at a time.

action.name: Gutting Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de daño cortante, más 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de daño cortante si el objetivo está {@condition grappled} con un arpón de púas.

variant.name: Garden of Badb
entries: Badb es la guerra y la guerra es Badb. Cuando la sangre del enemigo fluye en su nombre, la diosa toma nota y recompensa a sus guerreros con poderes exaltados, convirtiéndolos en su instrumento de destrucción. Las criaturas que tienen el {@b Woad War Paint trait} (referido como pintado para esta barra lateral) pueden realizar las siguientes acciones legendarias:

Sólo se puede utilizar una opción de acción legendaria a la vez y sólo al final del turno de otra criatura. Las acciones legendarias sólo están disponibles si una criatura genera una con un poder y se pierden todas al final del encuentro de combate.

entries: El pintado es inmune a todos los daños y condiciones hasta el final de su siguiente turno.

entries.name: War is Eternal (Cost 3 Actions)
entries: El pintado tiene como objetivo un humanoide muerto en el último asalto que pueda ver en un radio de 30 pies. El objetivo revive con todos sus puntos de golpe.

monster.name: Yarghuul
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Bioluminescence
entries: The yarghuul sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

trait.name: Defiling Slime
entries: As a bonus action, the yarghuul can fill a 5-foot cube within 5 feet of it with toxic slime, that area is {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, which lasts until it is burned away with fire. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage. If the slime is set on fire, it burns away after 1 round.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yarghuul makes two attacks: one with its slam and one with its tentacles.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Mutable Form
entries: The yarghuul transforms into fluorescent white slime or reverts to its true form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is also transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies. While in slime form, the yarghuul is {@condition incapacitated}. It has a speed of 30 feet, and can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. It can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to nonmagical damage.

While in slime form, the yarghuul can enter a creature's space and stop there. Each time that creature starts its turn with the yarghuul in its space, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage and suffer one level of {@condition exhaustion}.

monster.name: Yarghuul Broodmother
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Bioluminescence
entries: The broodmother sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

trait.name: Defiling Slime
entries: As a bonus action, the broodmother can fill a 10-foot cube within 10 feet of it with toxic slime, that area is {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, which lasts until it is burned away with fire. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage. If the slime is set on fire, it burns away after 1 round.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the broodmother fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) necrotic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 18}) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The broodmother can grapple one creature at a time.

action.name: Luring Chant {@recharge 5}
entries: The broodmother emits a magical chant. Every enemy within 300 feet of the broodmother that can hear it must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the broodmother for 1 minute or until the broodmother is {@condition incapacitated}.

While {@condition charmed} in this way, the target tries to get as close to the broodmother as possible, using its actions to {@action Dash} until it is within 5 feet of the broodmother. A {@condition charmed} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns and whenever it takes damage, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature has advantage on saving throws against the broodmother's Luring Chant for 24 hours.

action.name: Tumorous Birth
entries: The broodmother births a {@creature yarghuul|BoBH} and loses 40 hit points. The {@creature yarghuul|BoBH} appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the broodmother.

legendary.name: Tentacles
entries: The broodmother makes one attack with its tentacles.

legendary.name: Assimilate (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The broodmother targets a creature that is has {@condition grappled} within 20 feet of it. If the target has 30 hit points or fewer, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or die. If the target is killed in this way, it is liquefied and absorbed into the broodmother and the broodmother regains 30 hit points.

legendary.name: Swallow (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The broodmother swallows a creature that is has {@condition charmed}, or {@condition restrained}, within 20 feet of it. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the broodmother, and it takes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) necrotic damage at the start of each of the broodmother's turns. If the broodmother takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the broodmother must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the broodmother. If the broodmother dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Luring Chant (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The broodmother immediately recharges its Luring Chant and uses it.

Muchos alquimistas no creen en la existencia de la Tabla Esmeralda, un famoso artefacto que supuestamente contiene las fórmulas más poderosas jamás descubiertas. Sin embargo, unos pocos han dedicado su vida a su descubrimiento, y aún menos han puesto sus ojos en ella. Los que lo hacen se convierten en alkahzir, armados con los conocimientos de la Tabla Esmeralda. Ningún estado es permanente para el alkahzir, ninguna forma es sagrada. Cada fase de la vida y de la materia se convierte en transitoria hacia una forma cada vez mayor. Su revelación final llega con el secreto de la Piedra Filosofal, transmutando su propio corazón en la piedra y desbloqueando la trascendencia de su limitación final, la inmortalidad, que llega con el poder de alterar cualquier materia a voluntad.

entries.name: Immortal Nature
entries: Un alkhazir no necesita comer, beber ni dormir. No sufre la fragilidad de la vejez y no puede morir de viejo.

Pocos monstruos inspiran tantos mitos y falacias como el alp. Los cuentos populares describen sus encantos y sus bellas y seductoras voces, así como su aversión a las vírgenes. Lo que sí es cierto, sin lugar a dudas, es que se mueven sin hacer ruido y atacan por sorpresa, dando a sus víctimas rara vez la oportunidad de gritar de terror.

entries.name: Blood Addict
entries: Como vampiros superiores, los alpes, o alpor como también se les llama, no necesitan sangre para sobrevivir, pero son extremadamente adictos a ella. De todos los vampiros superiores, los alp son los más débiles a la hora de controlar sus impulsos más oscuros. Carecen de la contención y la capacidad de manipulación de los bruxa o de la astucia de los katakan, por lo que les resulta muy difícil esconderse en medio de la civilización. Para entregarse a su adicción, los alps confían sobre todo en el mal juicio o el aislamiento social de sus presas, cazando hombres solitarios, borrachos o pervertidos notorios.

entries.name: She-Devil
entries: Los Alpes, al igual que los bruxae, son womanoides, apareciendo exclusivamente como criaturas femeninas. Tienen el poder de transformarse en un bello humanoide femenino, a menudo un elfo, y por esta razón se les confunde comúnmente con súcubos, creyendo la gente que son lascivos e inclinados a seducir a jóvenes guapos. Algunos incluso pretenden que son capaces de convertirse en un perro negro o en un sapo venenoso, pero esto es una pura tontería.

entries.name: Home Invader
entries: Si se ven acorralados, los alpes son luchadores más que capaces, sus habilidades mágicas naturales les permiten aturdir y alimentarse de sus presas con facilidad y sus manos terminan en peligrosas garras. Sin embargo, la verdad es que los alpes prefieren atacar a sus víctimas {@condition unconscious}. Se cuelan en las habitaciones por la noche, drenando la sangre del durmiente y se van antes del amanecer. El alp volverá las noches siguientes para alimentarse de nuevo de la misma víctima, hasta que sea atrapado o la víctima muera. Por alguna razón desconocida, los alpes parecen desarrollar una conexión mística con sus víctimas dormidas, teniendo dificultades para dejarlas ir. Esta debilidad puede utilizarse en contra del alp, ya que hace que su comportamiento sea algo predecible.

entries.name: Between Beasts and Men
entries: Los alpes son vampiros ambiguos, no pueden soportar estar demasiado lejos de la humanidad, ya que necesitan satisfacer su adicción a la sangre, ni pueden esconderse directamente entre los hombres, debido a su falta de control. Por ello, un alp se ve reducido a compartir los mismos refugios y guaridas que los vampiros menores, acechando entre el mundo de los hombres y las bestias. Al contrario que los vampiros menores, los alpinos se preocupan por el confort y construyen su guarida en consecuencia, adornándola con muebles y comodidades, incluso con arte en alguna ocasión.

entries.name: Creation Myth
entries: Los cuentos populares cuentan la trágica historia de la noble y misteriosa raza eladrin, los elfos del Feywild. Se dice que cuando un eladrin pierde toda esperanza y se quita la vida, se crea una pesadilla viviente. Los sueños son cosas poderosas en el Feywild, adquiriendo una voluntad propia. La pesadilla viajará a través del tiempo y de los planos, buscando a un elfo desesperado, normalmente una virgen si la leyenda es creíble. La desafortunada hada morirá de {@condition exhaustion} en los días siguientes, incesantemente atormentada por visiones de muerte. A la noche siguiente, resucitará como un vampiro alpino.

entries.name: Fear Addict
entries: Los Alpes de la Muerte son vampiros antiguos que a menudo se confunden con banshee o bruxa, debido a su capacidad de emitir gritos mágicos. Algunos los llaman fantasmas, un nombre que encaja bastante bien, pues como los fantasmas acechan y atormentan a los hombres, merodeando cerca de los pueblos y atacando por la noche cuando hay luna llena. Los hábitos de alimentación favoritos de los alpinos consisten en colarse en un hogar dormido e invocar horribles pesadillas, terrores nocturnos, en un hombre dormido, pues les encanta el sabor del miedo en su sangre. Algunos sugieren que son la causa de las leyendas sobre hombres que se van a dormir sanos y se encuentran por la mañana blancos como la nieve, arrebatados por una horrible pesadilla.

entries.name: Uncanny Speed
entries: En el combate, los alpinos mortífagos muestran una increíble velocidad sobrenatural, incluso para los estándares de los vampiros. Su mayor baza es su agilidad y pueden moverse con una velocidad asombrosa que parece rozar el poder del teletransporte. Hay que apuntar la espada con gran precisión, ya que los alpes no tienen rival en el arte de esquivar los golpes. Además, a menudo se precipitan fuera de la vista y se esconden para lanzarse sobre ti o preparar su chillido. A diferencia de los bruxae, los alps de la muerte no pueden girar {@condition invisible}, pero al igual que los bruxae, emiten un chillido cuya onda expansiva puede incapacitar.

entries.name: Optional: Dream Haunting
entries: Un humanoide vivo mordido por un vampiro alp mientras duerme está bajo el efecto de la maldición del alp. Mientras esté bajo la maldición, la criatura recibirá vívidos sueños eróticos sobre una hermosa mujer elfa durante su descanso, deseándola incluso mientras está despierta. Una criatura bajo el efecto de la maldición tiene pequeñas marcas rojas en el cuero cabelludo. La maldición desaparece si el alp muere o si se lanza un hechizo {@spell remove curse} sobre la criatura.

items: Each time the creature takes a long rest it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw, with disadvantage if the alp bit it that night, or gain a level of {@condition exhaustion} and gain no benefits from its long rest.

Mientras la criatura está bajo el efecto de la maldición, el alp que la mordió gana un sentido sobrenatural, que le permite conocer la distancia y la dirección de la criatura, a menos que ambos estén en planos de existencia diferentes. Si la criatura muere, el alp lo sabe.

entries.name: Sadistic Killer
entries: Un encuentro con un garkain alfa casi siempre acaba en muerte, por lo que no hay muchos testimonios de ellos. Según algunos informes escritos, parece que estos horribles monstruos no se contentan con beber la sangre de sus víctimas. Los investigadores concluyeron, a partir de la sangre y las vísceras esparcidas por las escenas del crimen, que los garkain alfa despedazan a sus víctimas con gran deleite y se ensucian con sus sangrientas entrañas.

entries.name: Undeath Beacon
entries: Los garkain alfa a menudo reúnen a su alrededor a miembros de otras subespecies de vampiros menores, otros garkain y huidos principalmente, pero también necrófagos en ocasiones, actuando en tales situaciones como líderes de la manada. Sus sorprendentes habilidades psíquicas atraen instintivamente a otros no muertos hacia ellos, lo que les hace especialmente buenos "cómplices" de los vampiros superiores que pueden controlarlos o sobornarlos.

entries.name: Pack Leader
entries: Durante el combate, los garkains alfa suelen mantenerse a distancia de sus enemigos, intentando incapacitarlos mediante una ráfaga de energía mental que provoca visiones que seducen y desorientan. A pesar de su comportamiento bestial, los garkains alfa son bastante inteligentes y esperarán en una emboscada o maniobrarán a los miembros menores de su manada en una apariencia de estrategia.

entries.name: Amber Spring
entries: Después de varias vidas dedicadas a la búsqueda del placer y de haber visitado los cuatro rincones del mundo, algunos antiguos sátiros se cansan de la vida de caminante y se retiran a las profundidades del Feywild. Más sabios gracias a sus numerosas experiencias y viajes, se dedican a una vida de tranquilidad y contemplación, apreciando la sencilla belleza de la vida tras el incesante caos de sus años de juventud. Casi de forma instintiva, algunos emprenden un viaje espiritual por las zonas más remotas del plano. Su camino les lleva a un lugar de maravillas secretas, el manantial de ámbar. Allí, entran en comunión con los espíritus de los árboles eternos, beben del manantial de ámbar líquido y caen en un sueño de décadas, resguardados en un capullo de ámbar. Algunos nunca se despiertan, durmiendo para siempre entre los treantes, otros despiertan de su capullo con un propósito, tamaño y fuerza renovados.

entries.name: Herald of Rebirth
entries: Tocados por los espíritus primigenios del Feywild, los padres ámbar asumen el papel de ancianos venerados en las reuniones de los sátiros y les animan a proteger los lugares naturales. Como sólo llegan a pocos sátiros, suelen asumir personalmente un papel más activo en la custodia de los lugares mágicos, asegurándose de que permanezcan puros y fuera del alcance de las fuerzas malévolas. Para cumplir su vocación, se apoyan en los versos del renacimiento, una antigua letanía vigorizante enseñada por los espíritus y las cuentas mágicas de ámbar. Con este canto de esperanza y vida curan las heridas de la tierra, viajando a lugares asolados por la guerra, las calamidades mágicas y las maldiciones. Al mismo tiempo que curan la tierra en su viaje, la dotan de protectores, poderosos arbolitos, despertados por su canción y dotados de forma por el ámbar.

entries.name: Altruistic Life
entries: Los padres ámbar suelen encontrarse viajando por el mundo, al igual que los sátiros más jóvenes. Escuchan historias de guerras o catástrofes, e interrogan a los viajeros para saber dónde puede ser necesario su don. Muchos mantienen relaciones amistosas con organizaciones druídicas y templos dedicados a la protección de la naturaleza, incluidas las comunidades agrícolas. En el Feywild, frecuentan ocasionalmente la Corte de Verano, a veces cuidando los maravillosos jardines y palacios, haciendo crecer su ámbar mágico en los intrincados diseños arquitectónicos y esculturas, pero no tienen interés en las intrigas que se desarrollan constantemente dentro de la propia Corte.

entries.name: An Amber Father's Lair
entries: La guarida de un padre ámbar consiste en una zona boscosa que se ha beneficiado de sus Versos de Renacimiento en el último año. En dicho bosque, los espíritus dorados suelen aparecer por el rabillo del ojo, desapareciendo un segundo después. Un padre ámbar encontrado en su guarida tiene un índice de desafío de 11 (7.200 XP).

entries.name: Hidden Madness
entries: Since the dawn of creation, there have been supernatural entities that defy natural order. Things so alien that they violate our comprehension and reason, driving those that seek its truth mad. Eventually that madness becomes part of the collective memory, and seeking the truth, forbidden. Amygdalae are among them, huge aberrations that hide in plain sight, immortal vestiges of an age long past, invisible to all but the mad. Their role and purpose are unknowable, as some seem to merely exist, watching uncaringly millennia pass in absolute stillness, while others poison the mind of those seeking to unveil the eldritch truth. Most lore about the amygdalae is as cryptic and dubious as one can imagine. It consists primarily of accounts of fragmented memories conveyed by insane narrators. These isolated madmen have failed to convince the world about the hidden horrors that only a handful of them can see.

entries.name: Keepers of the Truth
entries: In the rare texts mentioning them, it is said that amygdalae were spawned by the elder force Bolothamogg to be the keepers of ancient revelations and horrific secrets that should be left well alone. They creep like eldritch spiders over fanes of the Far Realm and alien planes, ensuring that nothing in the multiverse can cross to taint the true reality of the outer dimensions. Those that come too close to the hidden truth become their prey and vanish without a trace soon after, abducted into unfathomable nightmare realms. Their existence instigates primal fear in all beings, an instinctive warning that only death and madness await any further, and so places they haunt have been abandoned for as long as anyone can remember.

entries.name: Dream Haunters
entries: Amygdalae are sometimes referred as Dream Haunters, or the Twilight Ones as they invade the nightmares of those that have caught their attention. This harrowing experiment is a torrential delirium of psionic violence where the self is shattered and reformed, often resulting in lasting dementia or mental illness. Those that withstand it are offered insight into the hidden truth, but this knowledge is miasmic, a spiraling descent into madness.
